title: After the 'ouch'
brief_description: After a series of small accidents, children apply first aid for a cut, splinter, bruise, nosebleed and minor burn. Also indicates correct response to a serious accident. Animation is used to show aspects of physiology. Suitab le for middle and upper primary level.
